message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special price of $1,200,000. We understand the importance of making this transaction beneficial for both parties, and we hope this proposal aligns well with your expectations.

Alice, your offer is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get the best possible deal. Considering the value this product holds for me, I'd be willing to pay $1,050,000. This price is fair and allows for a mutually beneficial transaction. I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I am proposing a counteroffer of $1,100,000 for the product. I believe this price strikes a balance between our interests and respects the value you see in the product. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
